title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1059/88 of 28 March 1988 laying down the arrangements applicable to Greece' s trade with Turkey
header:
23.4.1988 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 104/4
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1059/88
of 28 March 1988
laying down the arrangements applicable to Greece's trade with Turkey
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pending the entry, into force of the Protocol, the Hellenic Republic shall apply to trade with Turkey all the provisions resulting from the Agreement.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1989.
It shall expire on the date of entry into force of the Protocol.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 March 1988.
For the Commission
The President
I. KIECHLE
